entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Ice fog patches overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
